function_reachability: Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'printf'?
Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'main'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i < 7' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i < 7' always executed?
Can the loop with condition 'i < 2' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i < 2' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < 7' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < 2' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'i (line 4)' affect subsequent computations?
Does the value assigned to 'j (line 4)' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Does variable 'm' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
Is variable 'i' live at the end of function 'main'?
